localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body:
The president suggested he may veto the stimulus bill because the $600 relief payments are “ridiculously low."

Democrats, who have supported a much larger relief package, jumped on the opportunity to push for an expansion. House Republicans blocked that. https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs
blogPost.title:
The president suggested he may veto the stimulus bill because the $600 relief payments are “ridiculously low."

Democrats, who have supported a much larger relief package, jumped on the opportunity to push for an expansion. House Republicans blocked that. https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
总统暗示他可能会否决刺激法案，因为600美元的救济金“低得离谱”。

民主党人支持规模大得多的纾困方案，他们抓住机会推动扩张。众议院共和党人阻止了这一点。https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs

總統暗示他可能會否決刺激法案，因爲600美元的救濟金“低得離譜”。

民主黨人支持規模大得多的紓困方案，他們抓住機會推動擴張。衆議院共和黨人阻止了這一點。https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs

previous.excerpt:
Clean energy has been a discussion point for many years. I know Biden
administration will make it a focus but it seems like it’s suddenly talked about
as the next big thing. I see the ICLN etf up an insane amount recently but what
gives? Wasn’t clean energy always the future? So why now is it…
previous.title: ICLN - why now?

localize.title: ICLN-为什么是现在？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
多年来，清洁能源一直是一个讨论点。我认识拜登
政府将把它作为一个焦点，但它似乎突然被谈论起来
作为下一件大事。我看到ICLN ETF最近涨到了疯狂的水平，但是
赠送？清洁能源不是永远是未来吗？那么为什么现在是…呢？

localize.title: ICLN-爲什麼是現在？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
多年來，清潔能源一直是一個討論點。我認識拜登
政府將把它作爲一個焦點，但它似乎突然被談論起來
作爲下一件大事。我看到ICLN ETF最近漲到了瘋狂的水平，但是
贈送？清潔能源不是永遠是未來嗎？那麼爲什麼現在是…呢？
